DataElement.preferredName: Patient Review Information Not Done Description Reason Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A free text field that describes the reason for the patient not having reviewed information.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Review Information Not Done Description
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The act of appraisal, evaluation, or analysis._Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed._A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A free text field that describes a reason.
